condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var key;
key=ABS_SQLVALUE("SELECT COUNT(1) FROM JGCRM.LBORGANIZATION WHERE ID =? CONNECT BY PRIOR ID = FID START WITH ID = 13831",[$Login.User.OrgID]);
key>0

function.name: abs.Expression
function.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var xmid =O_WORKFLOW.XMMC;
var result=null;
var bean = ABS_LOADBEAN("com.apex.bss.mod.ibb.systemdocking.papers.LinkstecBean");
result = bean.execute(1007, $Login.User.UserID,1,xmid);
var note=result.get('note');
var code=result.get('code');
true;

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=? and roleid=6\",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM])","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-项目终止流程已提交保荐代表人审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var  yjbmid = ABS_SQLVALUE("select id  from jgcrm.lborganization where fid = 1 start with id= ? connect by prior fid = id",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM]);
var  cnt2 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from jgcrm.lborganization where id = ? and sfdlbm =1",[yjbmid]);
cnt2 > 0

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},0)",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select userid from lbmember where orgid=? and roleid=6\",[O_WORKFLOW.SQBM])","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select REPLACE(to_char(wmsys.wm_concat(userid)),',',';') from lbmember where orgid=13836 and roleid=4\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-终止项目已提交质控部总经理审批'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["UPDATE ECIF.TIB_XMXX SET SFRZZK=1,RZZKSJ = TO_NUMBER(TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYYMMDD')) WHERE ID ={0} ",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.ID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"}]]

function.name: abs.ExecSQL
function.arg: ["call ecif.PRO_IB_SENDWFNOTIFY(?,?,{0},{1},2,{2})",[{"expression":"O_WORKFLOW.InstID","scale":"","length":"","type":"1"},{"expression":"<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>\r\nABS_SQLVALUE(\"select id from jgcrm.tuser where id = 1279\")","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"},{"expression":"'-项目终止审批流程已审批完成'","scale":"","length":"","type":"0"}]]

step.name: 保荐业务部门负责人审核
并购融资部总经理审批

function.name: abs.Expression

condition.name: abs.FormExpOfStepCondition
condition.arg:
<%@ livebos language='javascript' %>
var cnt1 = ABS_SQLVALUE("select count(1) from ecif.tIB_XMLX where SFTZ=1 and id = ?",[O_WORKFLOW.XMMC.XMLX]);
cnt1 == 0
